welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Mestrino! Explore our picturesque city known for its rich history and delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Mestrino has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trissino Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Trissino Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at S. Angelo Airport, used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Marco Polo Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login with an email address.
